NilsB.title: Nils Bourdon
NilsB.subTitle: Musician Portfolio
NilsB.description: A website created for a client to represent the artist, and their work and provide additional contact options for event organizers. Within this project, I got the chance to do user research, prototype and test different designs, and develop the final product.

WSCBAU.title: WSC-BAU
WSCBAU.subTitle: Student Project
WSCBAU.description: The project was created by 4  students for our second-semester exam, for a company that's operating within the housing market situated in Hungary. For this project I got the chance to do use research and develop the front-end of the website.

UXBulgaria.title: UXBulgaria
UXBulgaria.subTitle: Instagram Page
UXBulgaria.description: uxBulgaria is social media page is a page that allows me to research and share different topics wihtin UX/UI. Each post is carefully researched and translated in order to make UX/UI information accessible to the Bulgarian community.

UCNAmbassadors.title: UCN DK
UCNAmbassadors.subTitle: Student Project
UCNAmbassadors.contributions: Front End Dev.  UX Research/ Prototyping
UCNAmbassadors.description: A project developed for the UCN ambassadors that present them and their events through engaging animations and straightforward navigation. For this project, I have taken part in user research, user testing, and developing the front end of the website. The biggest challenge at that time was figuring out a way to include responsive on-scroll animations that don't hurt the performance of the website.

Trailer3d.title: 3D Trailer
Trailer3d.subTitle: Freelance Project
Trailer3d.contributions: Front End Dev.  UX Research/ Prototyping
Trailer3d.description: This is a 3D animation created for the up-and-coming artist Taliaferro in order to promote his new album. Within this project I got the chance to model, texture and light three different scenes in Blender for the 3 main songs of the album, which I've then edited in After Effects with a CTA for the album.

TuborgAnimation.title: 3D Advert
TuborgAnimation.subTitle: Tuborg
TuborgAnimation.contributions: Front End Dev.  UX Research/ Prototyping
TuborgAnimation.description: This is a personal project created to test my skills within Blender and physics simulations. This is one of the hardest ones I had to create as I had to utilise everything I've learned so far, including smoke, particle, flip fluid and rigid body simulations.
